columns.name: S_EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Equipment associated to a Shipment

columns.name: S_EQUIPMENT_XID
columns.description: The XID for the equipment associated to a shipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL
columns.description: The initial is a mark that is registered with national or international authorities that is associated with a specific owner.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_NUMBER
columns.description: Number identifying the equipment used.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: A concatenation of the equipment initial and equipment number.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: An equipment type is a category of equipment. The system uses equipment types when it determines equipment capacity.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: An equipment group identifies the kind of equipment such as dry vans, flatbed trucks, container cars, hoppers, tankers, box cars, etc.. Equipment groups are primarily used by rate offering applied to the cost of moving goods on a class of equipment defined by the equipment group ID.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the actual equipment asset record.

columns.name: WEIGHT_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Indicates what the scale weight and tare weight fields represent: estimate, net or gross weight.

columns.name: SCALE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight recorded by scale when the equipment is loaded.

columns.name: SCALE_WEIGHT_UOM
columns.description: The unit of measure for the equipment scale weight.

columns.name: SCALE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment scale weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight of equipment when empty.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_UOM
columns.description: The equipment tare weight unit of measure.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment tare weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SCALE_LOCATION
columns.description: Scale location information.

columns.name: SCALE_NAME
columns.description: Scale name information.

columns.name: SCALE_TICKET
columns.description: The sequence ID printed on the scale ticket when weight is recorded.

columns.name: INTERMODAL_EQUIP_LENGTH
columns.description: A specially formatted field that is required by the railroads, representing the length of the equipment. It is in the format FtFtInIn, so 4803 would represent 48 feet, 3 inches.

columns.name: SUBSTITUTE_EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The equipment group substituted by carrier for this equipment.

columns.name: LOAD_CONFIG_VOLUME
columns.description: The actual volume taken by loading the units. Normally, it is larger than the total volume computed using the unit volume of the unit.

columns.name: LOAD_CONFIG_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment load configuration volume unit of measure.

columns.name: LOAD_CONFIG_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The equipment load configuration volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: OR_EQUIPMENT_SEQ
columns.description: N/A

columns.name: LOADING_LENGTH
columns.description: The equipment loading length (view only). Created by the system and shows the occupied load length of the equipment. If you have a 48 foot unit and 35 feet is used then the loading length is 35.

columns.name: LOADING_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment loading length unit of measure.

columns.name: LOADING_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The equipment loading length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TYPE_ASSIGNMENT_CODE
columns.description: The type assignment code (view only) indicates if the equipment is fixed from the order (equipment type was specified on order) or resource capacity, meaning it came from the resource assignment during the build shipment process.

columns.name: ASSIGNMENT_CODE
columns.description: The assignment code (view only) indicates how the equipment was assigned.

columns.name: PICK_SKU_GID
columns.description: With PICK_SKU_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID, this identifies the pickup inventory bucket adjusted during equipment type assignment.

columns.name: PICK_SKU_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: With the PICK_SKU_QUANTITY_GID, this indicates the pickup inventory bucket adjusted during equipment type assignment.

columns.name: DROP_SKU_GID
columns.description: With the DROP_SKU_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID, this identifies the drop-off inventory bucket adjusted during equipment type assignment.

columns.name: DROP_SKU_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: With the  DROP_SKU_QUANTITY_GID this indicates the drop-off inventory bucket adjusted during equipment type assignment.

columns.name: IS_FREIGHT
columns.description: Indicates if the equipment is carrying freight.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: CHECK_DIGIT
columns.description: The Check Digit field is used to validate that the Equipment Initial/Number field is entered correctly. You can leave this field blank if you do not want to validate Equipment Initial/Number. The ISO 6346 for ocean containers is used to verify the check digit value

columns.name: LICENSE_PLATE
columns.description: Informational field for identification.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_CODE
columns.description: The Equipment Type Code field is used to designate a specific type of equipment and attributes. For information only.

columns.name: MECHANICAL_DESIGNATION
columns.description: The Mechanical Designation field is an alphabetic code assigned to the physical description of the unit. For information only.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_OWNER_TYPE
columns.description: The asset owner of the equipment.

columns.name: EQUIP_MAX_GROSS_WT
columns.description: The maximum allowed gross weight for the equipment.

columns.name: EQUIP_MAX_GROSS_WT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment maximum gross weight unit of measure.

columns.name: EQUIP_MAX_GROSS_WT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment maximum gross weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT
columns.description: The actual height of the platform or floor above the ground or the rail.

columns.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment floor height unit of measure.

columns.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment floor height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_HEIGHT
columns.description: When empty, indicates the height from top of rail to the center of gravity.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment empty center of gravity height unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment empty center of gravity height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: DRY_CAPACITY
columns.description: The maximum interior capacity of the equipment.

columns.name: DRY_CAPACITY_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment dry capacity unit of measure.

columns.name: DRY_CAPACITY_BASE
columns.description: The equipment dry capacity in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: LIQUID_CAPACITY
columns.description: The number of gallons the equipment will hold.

columns.name: LIQUID_CAPACITY_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment liquid capacity unit of measure.

columns.name: LIQUID_CAPACITY_BASE
columns.description: The equipment liquid capacity in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CG_HEIGHT
columns.description: The freight center of gravity (view only) shows the calculated center of gravity values for the freight length, width and height.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CG_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment freight center of gravity unit of measure.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CG_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment freight center of gravity in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: GROSS_CG_HEIGHT
columns.description: When full, indicates the height from the top of rail to the center of gravity.

columns.name: GROSS_CG_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment gross center of gravity unit of measure.

columns.name: GROSS_CG_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment gross center of gravity in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: CALCULATED_GROSS_WT
columns.description: The actual sum of the cargo plus the actual tare weight. A calculated version of a scale weight.

columns.name: CALCULATED_GROSS_WT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment calculated gross weight unit of measure

columns.name: CALCULATED_GROSS_WT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment calculated gross weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_LOAD_LIMIT
columns.description: The maximum permissible weight of the commodity that can be loaded into the equipment.

columns.name: ACTUAL_LOAD_LIMIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment actual load limit unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_LOAD_LIMIT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment actual load limit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_LENGTH
columns.description: The inside length of the actual equipment from end to end inside walls, linings, and permanent bulkheads.

columns.name: ACTUAL_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment actual length unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The equipment actual length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_WIDTH
columns.description: The inside width of the actual equipment from side walls and linings.

columns.name: ACTUAL_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment actual width unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The equipment actual width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_HEIGHT
columns.description: The inside height of the actual equipment from the floor to the lowest point of the interior ceiling.

columns.name: ACTUAL_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment actual height unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment actual height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_LENGTH
columns.description: When empty, the lengthwise position of the center of gravity from the equipment bottom leftmost corner.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The equipment empty center of gravity length unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment empty center of gravity in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_WIDTH
columns.description: When empty, the widthwise position of the center of gravity from the equipment bottom leftmost corner.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The equipment empty center of gravity width unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The equipment empty center of gravity width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TRUCK_CENTER_LENGTH
columns.description: The length between the centers of the two truck/bogie systems. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: TRUCK_CENTER_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The length between the centers of the two truck/bogie systems in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TRUCK_CENTER_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the length between the centers of the two truck/bogie systems

columns.name: TRUCK_COUNT
columns.description: The total number of trucks/bogies on the equipment. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: TOTAL_AXLE_COUNT
columns.description: The total number of axles on the equipment. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: MAX_AXLE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Maximum allowed axle weight. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: MAX_AXLE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Maximum allowed axle weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: MAX_AXLE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the maximum allowed axle weight.

columns.name: TRUCK_A_WEIGHT
columns.description: Calculated weight on the truck/bogie A. A represents the bogie nearest to the origin of the equipment group.Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: TRUCK_A_AXLE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Calculated axle weight on the truck/bogie A. A represents the bogie nearest to the origin of the equipment group.Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: TRUCK_B_WEIGHT
columns.description: Calculated weight on the truck/bogie B. B represents the bogie at the end of the equipment group.Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: TRUCK_B_AXLE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Calculated axle weight on the truck/bogie B. B represents the bogie at the end of the equipment group.Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: AXLE_WEIGHT_IMBALANCE
columns.description: Denotes the ratio between the calculated axles weights.Applicable only to rail cars.
